CustomField.formula: if(CMPL123TMS__Training_Status__c = "Completed" || CMPL123TMS__Training_Status__c = "Completed - No Impact" || CMPL123TMS__Training_Status__c ="Assigned" || CMPL123TMS__Training_Status__c ="In Progress", if(CMPL123TMS__Due_Date__c < DATEVALUE(IF ( ISNULL(CMPL123TMS__Completed_Date__c),NOW(), CMPL123TMS__Completed_Date__c)), "Late", "On Time"), "Not Applicable")
CustomField.label: Timeliness Clock
